column4: I have a problem: i must recompile a kernel with gcc 2.95, but in the packages repositories, it only exists in i386, but I have an Athlon64, and the amd64 version of ubuntu installed. What can I do?
if you're new to linux, I suggest sitting back a few more releases before making use of 64 bit
otherwise, try downloading the i386 version manually and installing it with dpkg -i
